item.description:
SORRY EVERYONE!!!!! Spot Underground is having a poetry slam tonight, which would be cool, but they aren't opening until 6:30 and have a cover of $4 - so we're going to the RED FEZ instead!

So sorry for the last minute change! We'll have to try another time. I'm totally bummed. Hope you can still make it!

Welcome to the Providence Collective Monday Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: The Spot Underground in the Jewelry District at the corner of Elbow & Chestnut st.

The Spot has been around on Thayer Street for quite awhile, make no mistake and do not be confused - THIS is The Spot UNDERGROUND. Same organization, DIFFERENT location! This is a venue that holds a variety of different events from bands to art openings. I went here for the first time last month for pecha kucha, and was very impressed. Its a huge place with different levels to watch the bands play, a large central bar and lots of lounge type areas for conversation. Its not uber hipster trendy, but comfortable and a little quirky. A good place to come for a beer or cocktail and listen to music or just hang out. It's pretty cool and one to know about! So let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'm wearing a gray blue sweater, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: VENUE CHANGE!!!!!!! Monday Night Meetup - The Red Fez!!!!!
